item.author: jb-compose-bot

item.description:
24 Nov 13:52
jb-compose-bot
v1.5.11
b00a756
Compare
Choose a tag to compare
View all tags
1.5.11 Latest
Latest

Common

Features

  • Support Kotlin 1.9.21
  • Support Kotlin 2.0.0-Beta1

iOS

Fixes

  • Fix crash at GrGpuResource::release()
  • Fix crash with custom font
  • Composable functions returning null cause crash (fixed in Kotlin 1.9.21 and JetBrains Compose Compiler 1.5.4)

Desktop

Fixes

  • Fix race condition in animation tests

Dependencies

This version of Compose Multiplatform is based on the next Jetpack Compose libraries:

  • Compiler 1.5.4
  • Runtime 1.5.4
  • UI 1.5.4
  • Foundation 1.5.4
  • Material 1.5.4
  • Material3 1.1.2
Assets 2
